channel.description: Recent content in ShameGolf on Peter's Notebook

item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+195)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Hobby
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. Painting Shame Golf Painting Models (and sometimes food) Only finished models but also videos sometimes Listings (less frequently updated than they used to be) Stormbringer Magazine Contents Lore and Rules contents are complete, links are not Imperium Magazine Contents Lore and Rules Mortal Realms Magazine Contents Lore and Rules Special Games Workshop models 3D Printing Notes (printer needs to be reset) I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones.
